summary: The sprint planning architect clarifies a misunderstanding about the project's current status, apologizes for assumptions based on prior messages, and proposes a revised first sprint (SP-001) focusing on foundational features: mock login, adding employee profiles, and searching the directory.

decisions.title: Revise first sprint proposal to SP-001
decisions.details: Start with absolute basics including US-010 (Mock Login), US-015 (Add Employee), and US-001 (Employee Directory Search) to establish a testable app loop, estimated at 15-20 minutes total.

actions.task: Review and approve or adjust the proposed SP-001 sprint based on actual project status

risks.risk: Misalignment on project progress due to assumptions from conversation history
risks.mitigation: Confirm actual status upfront and base proposals solely on provided backlog data and vision document
